INSTRUMENT: WEATHER STATION HOST: FIELD EXPERIMENT
Instrument Information ====================== Instrument Id : WTHS Instrument Host Id : FEXP Instrument Name : WEATHER STATION Instrument Type : METEOROLOGY Instrument Manufacturer Name : METEOROLOGICAL RESEARCH INC.
Instrument Description ====================== The weather station was a portable station designed and built by Meteorological Research, Inc. Cup anemometer and thermistor thermometer measurements of wind speed and direction, dry-bulb air temperature, and rainfall were monitored continuously on a strip chart recorder. The instrument was mounted on a tripod approximately two meters above the surface.
Science Objectives ================== Measure atmospheric temperature, wind speed, and wind direction.
Operational Considerations ========================== N/A
